channel.title: DIY on synthDIY.space
channel.description: Recent content in DIY on synthDIY.space

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, my name is Eugene, I’m a recording engineer and music producer based in Toronto, Ontario. I’ve been in the industry since the mid 90s. Music is my passion. In 2023 I began this site as a way to document my eurorack build, as I committed to doing as much of it via DIY as possible. I hope to learn and to share what I’ve learned, and to chart my progress along the way.
item.content:
Hi, my name is Eugene, I’m a recording engineer and music producer based in Toronto, Ontario. I’ve been in the industry since the mid 90s. Music is my passion.

In 2023 I began this site as a way to document my eurorack build, as I committed to doing as much of it via DIY as possible. I hope to learn and to share what I’ve learned, and to chart my progress along the way.

Be kind, make music.

Follow me on mastodon

More to come…
